info.description: This is a service for running FRCS on a single stand of trees in California, funded by California Energy Commission.
info.title: Fuel Reduction Cost Simulator

tags.name: FRCS
tags.description: Fuel Reduction Cost Simulator (FRCS). Find out more about it in [Users Guide](https://www.fs.fed.us/pnw/pubs/pnw_gtr668.pdf)

post.description:
| Limits | Ground-Based Mech WT | Ground-Based CTL | Ground-Based Manual WT | Ground-Based Manual Log | Cable Manual WT/Log | Cable Manual WT | Cable Manual Log | Cable CTL | Helicopter Manual WT | Helicopter CTL |
|-|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|
| TreeVol Max CT, ft3 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 | 80 |
| TreeVol Max SLT, ft3 | 80 | 80 | 80 |  |  | 80 |  | 80 |  | 80 |
| TreeVol Max LLT, ft3 | 250 | 100 | 500 |  |  | 500 |  | 100 |  | 100 |
| TreeVol Max ALT, ft3 | 250 |  | 500 | 250 | 250 | 500 | 250 |  | 250 |  |
| TreeVol Max AT, ft3 | 250 |  | 500 | 250 | 250 | 500 | 250 |  | 250 |  |
| Max LLT/ac |  | 10 |  |  |  |  |  | 10 |  | 10 |
| Max LLT as % of ALT |  | 10 |  |  |  |  |  | 10 |  | 10 |
| Max Slope, % | 40 | 40 | 40 | 40 | 100 | 100 | 100 | 40 | 100 | 40 |
| Max Yarding Dist, ft |  |  |  |  | 1300 | 1300 | 1300 | 1300 | 10000 | 10000 |

System.description: Select from a list of 10 types of harvesting systems.

PartialCut.description: Type of harvest: clearcut or partial cut? If true, partial-cut; otherwise clear-cut.

DeliverDist.description: Average distance in feet that logs or trees are delivered to the landing. For ground-based and cable systems this is measured along the slope.

Slope.description: Average slope for the harvest unit in percent.

Elevation.description: Elevation is required for helicopter systems.

CalcLoad.description: Include the costs of fuel loading?

CalcMoveIn.description: Include the costs of moving equipment to the harvesting unit?

Area.description: Area in acres of one harvest unit if this is the only unit in a treatment contract or timber; Area in acres of the combined harvest units if multiple units that would likely be harvested together are close enough to drive equipment between them.

CalcResidues.description: Include the costs of collecting and chipping residues? This option is only available for the three WT systems and the ground-based CTL system.

UserSpecWDCT.description: User specified green wood density of chip trees in pounds per cubic foot.

UserSpecWDSLT.description: User specified green wood density of small log trees in pounds per cubic foot.

UserSpecWDLLT.description: User specified green wood density of large log trees in pounds per cubic foot.

UserSpecRFCT.description: User specified residue fraction of chip trees.

UserSpecRFSLT.description: User specified residue fraction of small log trees.

UserSpecRFLLT.description: User specified residue fraction of large log trees.

UserSpecHFCT.description: User specified hardwood fraction of chip trees.

UserSpecHFSLT.description: User specified hardwood fraction of small log trees.

UserSpecHFLLT.description: User specified hardwood fraction of large log trees.

RemovalsCT.description: Removals of chip trees per acre.

TreeVolCT.description: Tree volume of chip trees in cubic feet per tree.

RemovalsSLT.description: Removals of small log trees per acre.

TreeVolSLT.description: Tree volume of small log trees in cubic feet per tree.

RemovalsLLT.description: Removals of large log trees per acre.

TreeVolLLT.description: Tree volume of large log trees in cubic feet per tree.

TotalPerBoleCCF.description: Logging Cost per Hundred Cubic Feet
